mapper.select: SELECT CNTRT_LOG_SEQ_NO , RANK() OVER( ORDER BY CNTRT_LOG_SEQ_NO) AS NO , CNTRT_ID , INS_DATE , INS_TIME , UPD_DATE , UPD_TIME , CNTRT_EDIT_COMMENT , INS_PERSON_ID , UPD_PERSON_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TCOM.tb_user_info WHERE USER_ID = T1.INS_PERSON_ID) AS USER_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TCOM.tb_user_info WHERE USER_ID = T1.UPD_PERSON_ID) AS USER_NM FROM TCMS.tb_cntrt_history T1 WHERE CNTRT_ID = '20220501000003' ORDER BY T1.CNTRT_LOG_SEQ_NO DESC
